name: Winter Stealth
description:
Winter Stealth - You have to play as a hired agent who is able to get where the rest can not. Take orders and go on an adventure! Dodge enemies, complete missions and find secret items. Risk everything and go with the hero on a wonderful journey!

The game is a 2D platformer in which you need to: go to protected objects, bypassing enemies and traps, steal valuable items. But also do not forget that in addition to getting into the protected area, you also need to leave it unnoticed!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Nice soundtrack
- Various levels

Feel like a real agent who is able to penetrate the most protected places!
